title: molder2k
author: molder2k
content: ProjectThis project aims to make all the Italian luxury companies that work behindthe big brands known throughout the world. Many of these small companiesproduce quality products for the most prestigious brands but do not have thevisibility they deserve. The app store will give them the opportunity toemerge and be known in the world. The token will initially act as an invitationto build subscribers and audiences.Each holder of the token will participate weekly in the extraction of othertokens which will be assigned to the winners with weekly airdrops. Once theapp store has been created, the holders with the most tokens will participatein the Italian Luxury mega lottery which provides for the assignment of luxurycars, jewellery, exclusive trips and other fantastic and prestigious prizes.Winners will be able to convert their winnings into Bitcoins.Holding an ITA token can also belucrative. While the price of a tokenfluctuates with considerablevolatility, there’s now a burnprogram in place. Each transaction,1% fee is burned. This createsupward pressure on token value.Therefore, simply holding ITAtokens qualifies individuals for aportion of the lottery pool, whichmeans that it’s not necessary topurchase an NFT or a ticket to earnthrough the Italian Luxuryecosystem.BSC/BNB Contract Address: 0xB329cd2Ae7371633133dC39938d45976a370A956Official web site: https://www.italian-luxury.org/Telegram: https://t.me/ItaLuxuryTwitter: https://twitter.com/italianluxury3Whitepaper: https://www.italian-luxury.org/_files/ugd/368513_e4a0e68c58344732828499f4698ffa12.pdfExchanges & Charts:Pancake swap: https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?inputCurrency=0xb329cd2ae7371633133dc39938d45976a370a956&chainId=56TOP100: https://top100token.com/address/0xb329cd2ae7371633133dc39938d45976a370a956
